definition: traditional form of Chinese, as opposed to simplified form 簡體|简体[jian3 ti3]
complicated/many/in great numbers/abbr. for 繁體|繁体[fan2 ti3], traditional form of Chinese characters

sentences.english: A summation of the kinds of differences found between traditional characters and their simplified versions.
sentences.chinese: 爲繁體字和簡體字之間的諸多不同之處作一綜述。

sentences.english: Resurrecting complex characters is like asking women to restart binding their feet.
sentences.chinese: 恢復繁體字就跟要求女人恢復裹腳一樣。

sentences.english: This site wrote in Chinese(Big 5) & English.
sentences.chinese: 本站使用繁體中文及英文。

sentences.english: We should have a mastery of the advantages and disadvantages of both complex Chinese characters and simplified Chinese characters.
sentences.chinese: 漢字繁體字和簡體字，從不同的角度看，各有優缺點。

sentences.english: One of the TF2 wiki Traditional Chinese translator.
sentences.chinese: 一個TF2維基繁體中文翻譯者。

sentences.english: BIG5 to GB2312 with characters that corresponds to data conversion.
sentences.chinese: 於GB2312中與BIG5相對應繁體字編碼轉換。

sentences.english: All FB users can "vote" or "thumbs up" his choice.
sentences.chinese: 所有FB用戶可以“投票”或自己選擇“繁體”。

sentences.english: The services mentioned above are provided in Traditional ChineseLanguage only.
sentences.chinese: 以上提到的服務在僅繁體中文語言提供。

sentences.english: This application contains the first 20 chapters of HongLouMeng in traditional Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 本程序包含繁體版《紅樓夢》前20回。

sentences.english: This book contains 10 chapters in Traditional Chinese and Simplified Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 本書含十章，包括繁體中文和簡體中文版。

sentences.english: This application contains "ZiZhiTongJian" in traditional Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 本程序包含繁體版《資治通鑑》。

sentences.english: Who Can Benefit from This Guide of Traditional and Simplified Chinese Characters?
sentences.chinese: 誰應該使用這個繁體字和簡化字指南？

sentences.english: He practiced writing original forms of characters from a copybook of calligraphy.
sentences.chinese: 書法時臨摹的字帖都是繁體。

sentences.english: English or Traditional Chinese LOV can be chosen from now.
sentences.chinese: 清單值的部份可以依據喜好選擇英文或繁體中文。

sentences.english: Idiom's language supports both Traditional Chinese and Simplified Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 成語的版本亦同時支援繁體中文和簡體中文。

sentences.english: The change process of Chinese traditional and simplified characters was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 中華漢字繁體字與簡化字的變革過程。

definition: simplified form of Chinese characters, as opposed to traditional form 繁體|繁体[fan2 ti3]
simplified Chinese character, as opposed to traditional Chinese character 繁體字|繁体字[fan2 ti3 zi4]
standard form of a Chinese character/(Tw) traditional (i.e. unsimplified) characters
home page (of a website)/title page/front page/first page/fig. beginning/cover letter
to err/to dial a wrong number/to make a typo

Chinese language (Mandarin), emphasizing its national nature/Chinese as a primary or secondary school subject/Chinese in the context of the Nationalist Government/Guoyu, book of historical narrative c. 10th-5th century BC
